detaileddescription.para:
Create a true value.
A term representing true.

Create a false value.
A term representing false.
Create a bit-vector value zero.

simplesect.para: A term representing the bit-vector value 0 of given sort.

detaileddescription.para: Create a bit-vector value one.

simplesect.para: A term representing the bit-vector value 1 of given sort.

detaileddescription.para: Create a bit-vector value where all bits are set to 1.

simplesect.para: A term representing the bit-vector value of given sort where all bits are set to 1.

detaileddescription.para: Create a bit-vector minimum signed value.

simplesect.para: A term representing the bit-vector value of given sort where the MSB is set to 1 and all remaining bits are set to 0.

detaileddescription.para: Create a bit-vector maximum signed value.

simplesect.para: A term representing the bit-vector value of given sort where the MSB is set to 0 and all remaining bits are set to 1.

detaileddescription.para: Create a floating-point positive zero value (SMT-LIB: +zero).

simplesect.para: A term representing the floating-point positive zero value of given floating-point sort.

detaileddescription.para: Create a floating-point negative zero value (SMT-LIB: -zero).

simplesect.para: A term representing the floating-point negative zero value of given floating-point sort.

detaileddescription.para: Create a floating-point positive infinity value (SMT-LIB: +oo).

simplesect.para: A term representing the floating-point positive infinity value of given floating-point sort.

detaileddescription.para: Create a floating-point negative infinity value (SMT-LIB: -oo).

simplesect.para: A term representing the floating-point negative infinity value of given floating-point sort.

detaileddescription.para: Create a floating-point NaN value.

simplesect.para: A term representing the floating-point NaN value of given floating-point sort.

detaileddescription.para: Create a bit-vector value from its string representation.
Parameter base determines the base of the string representation.

simplesect.para: Given value must fit into a bit-vector of given size (sort).

parameterdescription.para: The base in which the string is given; 2 for binary, 10 for decimal, and 16 for hexadecimal.

simplesect.para: A term of kind BITWUZLA_KIND_VAL, representing the bit-vector value of given sort.

detaileddescription.para: Create a bit-vector value from its unsigned integer representation.

simplesect.para: Given value must fit into a bit-vector of given size (sort).

parameterdescription.para: The unsigned integer representation of the bit-vector value.

simplesect.para: A term of kind BITWUZLA_KIND_VAL, representing the bit-vector value of given sort.

detaileddescription.para: Create a bit-vector value from its signed integer representation.

simplesect.para: Given value must fit into a bit-vector of given size (sort).

parameterdescription.para: The unsigned integer representation of the bit-vector value.

simplesect.para: A term of kind BITWUZLA_KIND_VAL, representing the bit-vector value of given sort.

detaileddescription.para: Create a floating-point value from its IEEE 754 standard representation given as three bit-vector values representing the sign bit, the exponent and the significand.

simplesect.para: A term of kind BITWUZLA_KIND_VAL, representing the floating-point value.

detaileddescription.para: Create a floating-point value from its real representation, given as a decimal string, with respect to given rounding mode.

simplesect.para: Given rounding mode may be an arbitrary, non-value rounding mode term. If it is a value, the returned term will be a floating-point value, else a non-value floating-point term.

parameterdescription.para: The decimal string representing a real value.

simplesect.para: A floating-point representation of the given real string. If rm is of kind BITWUZLA_KIND_VALUE the floating-point will be of kind BITWUZLA_KIND_VALUE, else it will be a non-value term.

memberdef.argsstring: (BitwuzlaSort sort, BitwuzlaTerm rm, const char *num, const char *den)
memberdef.name: bitwuzla_mk_fp_from_rational

detaileddescription.para: Create a floating-point value from its rational representation, given as a two decimal strings representing the numerator and denominator, with respect to given rounding mode.

simplesect.para: Given rounding mode may be an arbitrary, non-value rounding mode term. If it is a value, the returned term will be a floating-point value, else a non-value floating-point term.

parameterdescription.para: The decimal string representing the numerator.
The decimal string representing the denominator.

simplesect.para: A floating-point representation of the given rational string. If rm is of kind BITWUZLA_KIND_VALUE the floating-point will be of kind BITWUZLA_KIND_VALUE, else it will be a non-value term.

detaileddescription.para: Create a rounding mode value.

simplesect.para: A term of kind BITWUZLA_KIND_VAL, representing the rounding mode value.

detaileddescription.para: Create a term of given kind with one argument term.

simplesect.para: A term representing an operation of given kind.

detaileddescription.para: Create a term of given kind with two argument terms.

parameterdescription.para: The first argument to the operator.
The second argument to the operator.

simplesect.para: A term representing an operation of given kind.

memberdef.argsstring: (BitwuzlaKind kind, BitwuzlaTerm arg0, BitwuzlaTerm arg1, BitwuzlaTerm arg2)
memberdef.name: bitwuzla_mk_term3

detaileddescription.para: Create a term of given kind with three argument terms.

parameterdescription.para: The first argument to the operator.
The second argument to the operator.
The third argument to the operator.

simplesect.para: A term representing an operation of given kind.

detaileddescription.para: Create a term of given kind with the given argument terms.

simplesect.para: A term representing an operation of given kind.

detaileddescription.para: Create an indexed term of given kind with one argument term and one index.

simplesect.para: A term representing an indexed operation of given kind.

memberdef.argsstring: (BitwuzlaKind kind, BitwuzlaTerm arg, uint64_t idx0, uint64_t idx1)
memberdef.name: bitwuzla_mk_term1_indexed2

detaileddescription.para: Create an indexed term of given kind with one argument term and two indices.

simplesect.para: A term representing an indexed operation of given kind.

memberdef.argsstring: (BitwuzlaKind kind, BitwuzlaTerm arg0, BitwuzlaTerm arg1, uint64_t idx)
memberdef.name: bitwuzla_mk_term2_indexed1

detaileddescription.para: Create an indexed term of given kind with two argument terms and one index.

simplesect.para: A term representing an indexed operation of given kind.

memberdef.argsstring: (BitwuzlaKind kind, BitwuzlaTerm arg0, BitwuzlaTerm arg1, uint64_t idx0, uint64_t idx1)
memberdef.name: bitwuzla_mk_term2_indexed2

detaileddescription.para: Create an indexed term of given kind with two argument terms and two indices.

simplesect.para: A term representing an indexed operation of given kind.

memberdef.argsstring: (BitwuzlaKind kind, uint32_t argc, BitwuzlaTerm args[], uint32_t idxc, const uint64_t idxs[])
memberdef.name: bitwuzla_mk_term_indexed

detaileddescription.para: Create an indexed term of given kind with the given argument terms and indices.

simplesect.para: A term representing an indexed operation of given kind.

detaileddescription.para: Create a (first-order) constant of given sort with given symbol.

simplesect.para: A term of kind BITWUZLA_KIND_CONST, representing the constant.

detaileddescription.para: Create a one-dimensional constant array of given sort, initialized with given value.

parameterdescription.para: The term to initialize the elements of the array with.

simplesect.para: A term of kind BITWUZLA_KIND_CONST_ARRAY, representing a constant array of given sort.

detaileddescription.para: Create a variable of given sort with given symbol.

simplesect.para: This creates a variable to be bound by quantifiers or lambdas.
A term of kind BITWUZLA_KIND_VAR, representing the variable.
